==German== ===Etymology=== {{prefix|de|an|melden}} ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈʔanmɛldn̩/|/ˈʔanmɛldən/}} * {{audio|de|De-anmelden.ogg|Audio}} ===Verb=== {{de-verb-weak|meldet an|meldete an|angemeldet}} # to [[announce]], [[declare]] # to [[enroll]] # to [[register]] #: {{ux|de|Er hat seinen Wohnsitz bei der Gemeinde '''angemeldet'''.|He registered his residence with the community.}} ====Conjugation==== {{de-conj-weak|meld|gemeldet|h|e||an}} ====Derived terms==== * {{l|de|Anmelden}} * {{l|de|Anmelder}} * {{l|de|Anmeldung}} * {{l|de|angemeldet}} ====Antonyms==== * {{l|de|abmelden}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}}
